text: These resources address the diagnosis or management of congenital bilateral absence of the vas deferens:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: CFTR-Related Disorders  - Genetic Testing Registry: Congenital bilateral absence of the vas deferens  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Infertility  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Pathway of sperm (image)  - MedlinePlus Health Topic: Assisted Reproductive Technology   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health co
